Package CoronaTest

Class Person

  • Object
    • CoronaTest.Person
  • public class Person
extends Object
    A person as a test-subject. It encapsulates name, date of birth and a history of corona-tests.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Date birthDate
      the date of birth of this person
      private String name
      the name of this person
      private CoronaTest[] tests
      the history of corona-tests of this person, no order guaranteed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Person​(String name, Date birthDate, CoronaTest[] tests)
      creates person.

    • Method Summary

      simple getter

      get all corona-tests of this person
      CoronaTest lastTestBeforeDate​(Date testsBefore)
      retrieves the corona-test of this person which is closest to, but before, a given date.

      set the date of birth of this person.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Person

        public Person​(String name,
              Date birthDate,
              CoronaTest[] tests)
        creates person.
        For simplicity, arguments are not validated.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the person
        birthDate - the date of birth of the person
        tests - the current history of corona-tests of the person

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public String getName()
        simple getter
        Returns:
        the name of this person

      • getBirthDate

        public Date getBirthDate()
        get the date of birth of this person.
        Implemented as a defensive getter, that is, it returns a copy of the date held by this person.
        Returns:
        the date of birth of this person

      • getTests

        public CoronaTest[] getTests()
        get all corona-tests of this person
        Returns:
        the history of corona-tests of this person

      • setName

        public void setName​(String name)
        set the name of this person.
        For simplicity, arguments are not validated.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to set

      • setBirthDate

        public void setBirthDate​(Date birthDate)
        set the date of birth of this person.
        Only non-null arguments are accepted. Invalid arguments are ignored.
        Parameters:
        birthDate - the date of birth to set

      • setTests

        public void setTests​(CoronaTest[] tests)
        replace all tests of this person.
        For simplicity, arguments are not validated.
        Parameters:
        tests - the new history of tests for this person

      • lastTestBeforeDate

        public CoronaTest lastTestBeforeDate​(Date testsBefore)
        retrieves the corona-test of this person which is closest to, but before, a given date.
        If no such test exists null is returned.
        Parameters:
        testsBefore - the date for which the most recent test is requested
        Returns:
        the corona-test which is closest to, but before, testBefore

      • coronaStatus

        public String coronaStatus​(Date date)
        Retrieves a textual representation of the corona-status of this person on a given date. It is "name, birthDate, Corona Status: " + CoronaTest.outcome() of the last test before the given date if it is still valid on the given date.
        If there is no such test the Corona Status is "no valid test available" instead.
        Parameters:
        date - date for which the corona-status is retrieved
        Returns:
        the corona status description

      • toString

        public String toString()
        String representation of this object. It is "name, birthDate".
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        string representation of this object
